com.scvngr.levelup.core.net

Interface AccessTokenRetriever

  • All Superinterfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable

    @LevelUpApi(contract=DRAFT)
public interface AccessTokenRetriever
extends android.os.Parcelable
    Interface for a class that can be used to retrieve the currently logged in User's AccessToken.
